nodes.text: In 37 BBY, Darth Maul massacred everyone in the Orsis Academy, following orders from his master, Darth Sidious. The decimation of all within the academy signaled its end.
Maul received his orders to slay all in the academy, so he got inside the academy and entered all of the dorms, killing every cadet inside, including Daleen.

He soon found Kilindi Matako, Trezza and Meltch Krakko in Trezza's office. Maul battled Krakko briefly and murdered him. Trezza pleaded with Maul to calm himself, pulling a knife in the process and throwing it at Maul who used the Force and deflected it back into Trezza's chest, killing him. He also killed Kilindi.
